title: Presentation: Computing Affine Model for K9 Dessin
section: Weirstrass P Function on Hyperbolic plane
text:
Weirstrass P Function on Hyperbolic plane
\[
\wp_\Lambda(z) = \frac{1}{z^2} + \sum_{\lambda \in \Lambda, \lambda \neq0}{\left(\frac{1}{(z-\lambda)^2}-\frac{1}{w^2})\right)}
\] For example, We may take the poincare disk model and take the center to be the origin and use the Beltrami coordinate system and take \(\Lambda\) to be the point of its vertex.
